results.cleanName: Universes Beyond Fallout Scrappy Survivors Commander Deck

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: Featuring the goodest of boys, Dogmeat, as your commander, this deck focuses on scavenging for tools, Food tokens, and allies. It also introduces Junk tokens, which can be sacrificed to draw cards. If you enjoy tokens and suiting up your creatures with Auras and Equipment, then this is the deck for you.

results.name: Universes Beyond: Fallout - Scrappy Survivors Commander Deck

results.cleanName: Universes Beyond Fallout Mutant Menace Commander Deck

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: Looking for something a little "different," then try your hand at the Mutant Menace deck, which incorporates Fallout's dangerous and strange mutated creatures, such as this deck's commander, The Wise Mothman. Play creatures, then buff them with counters and proliferate. Irradiate yourself and your opponents using the new rad counters (player counters that mill and damage you).

results.name: Universes Beyond: Fallout - Mutant Menace Commander Deck

results.cleanName: Universes Beyond Fallout Hail Caesar Commander Deck

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: There's also the Hail, Caesar deck, featuring the franchise's infamous Caesar as your commander. This deck's themes revolve around leaders of militant factions and their soldiers, as well as wasteland raiders. Be aggressive with an army of creature tokens with the help of the squad mechanic, which lets you create extra token copies of creatures.

results.name: Universes Beyond: Fallout - Hail, Caesar Commander Deck

results.cleanName: Universes Beyond Fallout Science Commander Deck

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: Finally, we have our Science! deck, which focuses on high-tech energy weapons, scientists, synths, and pre-war robots. With Dr. Madison Li as your commander, you will play artifacts to generate energy, a returning mechanic fit for Fallout.

results.name: Universes Beyond: Fallout - Science! Commander Deck

results.cleanName: Universes Beyond Fallout Collector Booster Pack

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
The vault is open! This booster is so overstuffed with perks for Fallout fans, it’ll test the limits of your carrying capacity. Expect to encounter Rares and/or Mythics, Traditional Foils, Extended-Art cards, and special Fallout-themed card treatments. Each Magic: The Gathering—Fallout Collector Booster contains 15 Magic: The Gathering cards and 1 Traditional Foil double-sided token, with a combination of 7–14 cards of rarity Rare or higher and up to 7 Uncommon, up to 5 Common, and 1 Land cards. Every pack contains a total of 12 cards with a shining foil treatment, including 3–10 Surge Foils and 2–9 Traditional Foils.
Contents:
• THE VAULTS ARE OPEN—Collect Magic cards featuring fan-favorite characters, thematic game mechanics, and art that explores the post-nuclear world of the Fallout series
• SCAVANGE THE WASTELAND’S MOST S.P.E.C.I.A.L. CARDS—Get a Collector Booster full of Rare cards, special Fallout alt-art, alt-frame cards, and a total of 6–7 Extended-Art cards
• HOLD ONTO ANYTHING SHINY—Every pack contains 12 cards with a foil treatment that will gleam in the harsh light of the nuclear wastes, including 3–10 special Surge Foil cards with a rippling shine—it’s tomorrow’s technology today!
• PLAY A GAME THAT FUSES ART, STORIES & STRATEGY—Magic: The Gathering is a collectible card game that weaves deep strategy with art and mechanics that explore the themes of a particular world and story—whether you want to play a casual game with friends, collect cool cards, or get competitive, Magic welcomes you to The Gathering
• CONTENTS—1 Magic: The Gathering - Fallout Collector Booster containing 15 MTG cards

results.name: Universes Beyond: Fallout - Collector Booster Pack

results.cleanName: Universes Beyond Fallout Collector Booster Display Master Case

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
The vault is open! This booster is so overstuffed with perks for Fallout fans, it’ll test the limits of your carrying capacity. Expect to encounter Rares and/or Mythics, Traditional Foils, Extended-Art cards, and special Fallout-themed card treatments. Each Magic: The Gathering—Fallout Collector Booster contains 15 Magic: The Gathering cards and 1 Traditional Foil double-sided token, with a combination of 7–14 cards of rarity Rare or higher and up to 7 Uncommon, up to 5 Common, and 1 Land cards. Every pack contains a total of 12 cards with a shining foil treatment, including 3–10 Surge Foils and 2–9 Traditional Foils.
Contents:
• 24 Universes Beyond: Fallout Collector Booster Displays

results.name: Universes Beyond: Fallout - Collector Booster Display Master Case

results.cleanName: Universes Beyond Fallout Collector Booster Omega Pack

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
The vault is open! This booster is so overstuffed with perks for Fallout fans, it’ll test the limits of your carrying capacity. Expect to encounter Rares and/or Mythics, Traditional Foils, Extended-Art cards, and special Fallout-themed card treatments. Each Magic: The Gathering—Fallout Collector Booster contains 15 Magic: The Gathering cards and 1 Traditional Foil double-sided token, with a combination of 7–14 cards of rarity Rare or higher and up to 7 Uncommon, up to 5 Common, and 1 Land cards. Every pack contains a total of 12 cards with a shining foil treatment, including 3–10 Surge Foils and 2–9 Traditional Foils.
Contents:
• THE VAULTS ARE OPEN—Collect Magic cards featuring fan-favorite characters, thematic game mechanics, and art that explores the post-nuclear world of the Fallout series
• SCAVANGE THE WASTELAND’S MOST S.P.E.C.I.A.L. CARDS—Get a Collector Booster full of Rare cards, special Fallout alt-art, alt-frame cards, and a total of 6–7 Extended-Art cards
• HOLD ONTO ANYTHING SHINY—Every pack contains 12 cards with a foil treatment that will gleam in the harsh light of the nuclear wastes, including 3–10 special Surge Foil cards with a rippling shine—it’s tomorrow’s technology today!
• PLAY A GAME THAT FUSES ART, STORIES & STRATEGY—Magic: The Gathering is a collectible card game that weaves deep strategy with art and mechanics that explore the themes of a particular world and story—whether you want to play a casual game with friends, collect cool cards, or get competitive, Magic welcomes you to The Gathering
• CONTENTS—1 Magic: The Gathering - Fallout Collector Booster containing 15 MTG cards
